A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars TheLast Jedi definitely was something different unlike the previous film. The visuals and actions were on point. I think Luke's story arc now can come to an almost end. It was a very entertaining film despite some boring parts. I think there was some unnecessary comedy for some characters that didn't need it in the first place\, not only it damage the film but the way you look at the characters specially if they are bad guys. Also they completely disregard the Knights of Ren all together\, there were some things that didnt carry over from the previous film. It was a nice addition but a very disappointing conclusion until episode 9 arrives.
